languages.text: "Слушайте меня! Комиссар — предатель и лжец, отправивший на смерть множество людей, чтобы сберечь свою шкуру и выслужиться перед ксеносами. Схватить его!"
"Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"
languages.original_text: "Слушайте меня! Комиссар — предатель и лжец, отправивший на смерть множество людей, чтобы сберечь свою шкуру и выслужиться перед ксеносами. Схватить его!"

traits.locale_text: "Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"
"Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"
"Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"
"Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"
"Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"

languages.text: “大家听我说！政委是个骗子，是个叛徒！为了赢得异形的青睐，保住性命，他把很多人送进了屠宰场！抓住它！”
languages.original_text: "Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"

traits.locale_text: “大家听我说！政委是个骗子，是个叛徒！为了赢得异形的青睐，保住性命，他把很多人送进了屠宰场！抓住它！”

languages.text: "Hört mich an! Der Kommissar ist ein Lügner und Verräter, der viele in den Tod geschickt hat, um seine eigene Haut zu retten und die Gunst der Xenos nicht zu verlieren. Ergreift ihn!"
languages.original_text: "Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"

traits.locale_text: "Hört mich an! Der Kommissar ist ein Lügner und Verräter, der viele in den Tod geschickt hat, um seine eigene Haut zu retten und die Gunst der Xenos nicht zu verlieren. Ergreift ihn!"

languages.text: « Écoutez-moi ! Le commissaire est un menteur et un traître qui a envoyé de nombreuses personnes à la mort pour sauver sa propre peau et rester dans les bonnes grâces des xénos. Saisissez-vous de lui ! »
languages.original_text: "Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez-moi ! Le commissaire est un menteur et un traître qui a envoyé de nombreuses personnes à la mort pour sauver sa propre peau et rester dans les bonnes grâces des xénos. Saisissez-vous de lui ! »

languages.text: «¡Escúchenme! El Comisario es un traidor y un mentiroso que ha enviado a mucha gente a su muerte para salvar su propio pellejo y protegerse de los xenos. ¡Arréstenlo!».
languages.original_text: "Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Escúchenme! El Comisario es un traidor y un mentiroso que ha enviado a mucha gente a su muerte para salvar su propio pellejo y protegerse de los xenos. ¡Arréstenlo!».

languages.text: 「聞け！コミッサーは嘘つきの裏切り者だ。自分の保身と異種族の機嫌を取るために、多くの人々を死に追いやった。やつを捕まえろ！」
languages.original_text: "Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"

traits.locale_text: 「聞け！コミッサーは嘘つきの裏切り者だ。自分の保身と異種族の機嫌を取るために、多くの人々を死に追いやった。やつを捕まえろ！」

languages.text: "Beni dinleyin! Komiser, kendi postunu kurtarmak ve zenoların gönlünü hoş tutmak adına birçoklarını ölümüne göndermiş bir yalancı ve haindir. Yakalayın onu!"
languages.original_text: "Listen to me! The Commissar is a liar and a traitor who has sent many people to their deaths to save his own hide and stay in the xenos' good graces. Seize him!"

traits.locale_text: "Beni dinleyin! Komiser, kendi postunu kurtarmak ve zenoların gönlünü hoş tutmak adına birçok kişiyi ölümüne göndermiş bir yalancı ve bir haindir. Yakalayın onu!"
